=== Mentor Project Definition ===

 <nowiki>[[File:IconsPage/IconHandshake.png]]</nowiki> Agreed to get back the roots of the mentoring project - teams helping teams and people helping people.

 <nowiki>[[File:IconsPage/IconHandshake.png]]</nowiki> Agreed that putting together a council/presidency/leadership strays from the vision of teams helping teams and people helping people.

 <nowiki>[[File:IconsPage/IconHandshake.png]]</nowiki> Agreed that the collective of mentors is a project and not a team or hierarchy.

 <nowiki>[[File:IconsPage/info.png]]</nowiki> Discussed creating a mission statement to help define and outline what the mentor project is all about.

=== Mentors ===
 <nowiki>[[File:IconsPage/info.png]]</nowiki>  Discussed the two guidelines that were setup for mentors:
	
        <nowiki>[[File:IconsPage/iconCircleSmall.png]]</nowiki> He/She must be an Ubuntu member

	<nowiki>[[File:IconsPage/iconCircleSmall.png]]</nowiki> The state they reside in must be an approved state (If a state is seeking help, whether they are new, or struggling, it doesn't't make sense for another struggling/new team to try and help them out)

=== UncleSam bot ===

 <nowiki>[[File:IconsPage/info.png]]</nowiki> The RSS has been turned off for over a week (or two) now

 <nowiki>[[File:IconsPage/info.png]]</nowiki> The only channels that UncleSam hangs out in are the ones where he has been invited

 <nowiki>[[File:IconsPage/IconHandshake.png]]</nowiki> Agreed that UncleSam will not be used for jokes and will the joke plugin will be disabled

 <nowiki>[[File:IconsPage/info.png]]</nowiki> The goals for UncleSam are as follows:

	<nowiki>[[File:IconsPage/editor.png]]</nowiki> Provide LoCo specific info and other Community type factoids
	
        <nowiki>[[File:IconsPage/editor.png]]</nowiki> Provide logging and stats on http://unclesam.ubuntu-us.org

 <nowiki>[[File:IconsPage/info.png]]</nowiki> An email will be sent on the US Teams mailing list about how UncleSam is enabled, what he can do and to contact Vorian for more info
